c74object.name: j.parameter_array
c74object.digest: Define an array of remote access to parameters
c74object.description: j.remote_array allows to declare an array or remote access to parameter values. This way views (user interfaces) can be separated from, and developed independently of, their underlying model.

inlet.digest: Remote value of the selected instance(s)
inlet.description: Remote value of the selected instance(s)
Index of the instance to send value to. (1 to max number of instance). * will send value to all instances)

outlet.description: Deferlowed remote parameter's value prepended with the set message so that gui objects can be connected directly. When format attribute is set to single (default) output will be the selected instance remote parameter's value. When format is set to array, output will be a list of all remote parameters' value.

Remote parameter's value. When format attribute is set to single (default) output will be the selected instance remote parameter's value. When format is set to array, output will be a list of all remote parameters' value.
Output the instance number of the value output at both left outlets

objarg.name: name
objarg.description: Remote nodes array name defined using a bracket-based syntaxe: my/parameter.[2]

method.name: bang
method.digest: Outputs currently stored remote parameter value
method.description: Outputs currently stored remote parameter value

method.name: anything
method.digest: Store and output current remote parameter's value.
method.description: Store and output current remote parameter's value.

method.name: array
method.digest: Dispatch a list of values to instances of the remote parameters
method.description: The array message followed by a list dispatches a list of values to instances of the remote parameters

method.name: array/select
method.digest: This message select which instance to address
method.description: The array_select message followed by an int select whichs j.parameter_array's instance to address

method.name: dump
method.description: The dump message dumps all attributes values out of the rightmost outlet

method.name: set
method.digest: Send value to remote parameter without causing output
method.description: The set message followed by a value sends the value to the array of remoted parameters without causing output at j.remote_array two left outlets

method.name: setArray
method.digest: Dispatch values to each instance of parameter remotes without causing output
method.description: The setArray message followed by a list dispatches the values to parameter remotes instances without causing output at j.remote_array two left outlets

attribute.name: address
attribute.description: Names of the distant parameters address. The address must be a symbol containing a number of instances to bind to placed between brackets such as 'address my/parameter.[5]'

attribute.name: format
attribute.digest: Format of the values output: single or array
attribute.description: Format of the values output. When set to single (default), output will be the selected instance distant parameter's value. When set to array, output will be a list of all instances distant parameter's value.

enum.name: single
enum.digest: Output the selected instance distant parameter's value
enum.description: Output the selected instance distant parameter's value

enum.name: array
enum.digest: Output the all instances distant parameter's value as a list
enum.description: Output the all instances distant parameter's value as a list

attribute.name: tags
attribute.digest: Tags associated with the array of remotes
attribute.description: Tags associated with the array of remotes

attribute.name: unit
attribute.digest: Unit used to exchange value with distant parameter
attribute.description: The unit attribute allows to define a unit that will be used to send or receive value to/from a bound distant parameter. Available units depend on the distant parameters dataspace attribute.
